## üìã Session Assignment Rules

### Before Starting Work

1. Check this file for active sessions
2. Verify no conflicts with your planned work
3. Register your session immediately
4. Update this file atomically with session creation

### Conflict Prevention

- **Same File:** Do not work on files being modified by active sessions
- **Same Module:** Coordinate if working in same module
- **Dependencies:** Check if your work depends on active sessions

### Session States

- **üü¢ Active:** Currently working, do not conflict
- **‚è∏Ô∏è Paused:** Temporarily stopped, may resume soon
- **‚úÖ Complete:** Finished today, ready for review
- **üî¥ Blocked:** Waiting on external dependency
